div.p: Recommendations #8 (2022 CDC Clinical Practice Guideline for Prescribing Opioids for Pain):

details.p: The following artifacts formalize the description of the logic and behavior defined by this recommendation.

tr.td: Patient is 18 or older. Patient has been prescribed 72 HR Fentanyl 0.075 MG/HR Transdermal System (RXNorm 197696) 1 patch per 10 days for 30 days. This will trigger the message "Incorporate into the management plan strategies to mitigate risk; including considering offering naloxone when factors that increase risk for opioid overdose are present." Consider offering naloxone given following risk factor(s) for opioid overdose: Average MME (54.000000 'mg/d') >= 50 mg/day.
